item.description:
We would like everyone to bring a main dish from their native country or a country that interests them.  This will be like a "Pot Luck Dinner"  Also if you have a folding chair that you can bring it would be helpful as we need some extra seating.  If there is a dish from your native country that you would like to bring or just a dish that you like to make.  If every attendee brings something there should be enough for everyone.

After we eat I would like everyone to come prepared to speak in Spanish about the dish they brought.

 

If you have any questions you can call Kurt @ 860-978-051
item.how_to_find_us: As you come in the Main drive way there is a club house on the right with parking. Everyone can park there and my condo is a short walk.

group.name: The Hartford Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: Evening of Sampling food from other countries & Conversation
